us.phonetic: /adj. ɪˈlæbərɪt; v. -əˌreɪt/, (adj. i lab′ər it; v. i lab′ə rāt′)

example.eg: There was an elaborate display in the shop window.
example.egtrans: 商店橱窗里有一个精巧的陈设。

example.eg: The technician was working with an elaborate lighting system.
example.egtrans: 技术员正在处理一个复杂的照明系统。

example.eg: The thieves had come up with an elaborate plan to rob the bank; they'd thought of everything.
example.egtrans: 劫匪们为抢劫银行，精心设计了一个计划；一切都想得很周全。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 精心设计的, 策划周密的

example.eg: Your idea sounds interesting. Could you elaborate?
example.egtrans: 你的想法很有趣。能做详细说明吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 作详细说明, 进一步阐释

example.eg: Could you elaborate on your earlier comment about unemployment?
example.egtrans: 你能详细描述一下早先你对失业的评论吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 详细阐述, 详尽解释

example.eg: The author is currently elaborating his idea for a novel.
example.egtrans: 作者当前正在为一部小说详尽构思。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 详尽构思, 一步步发展

us.phonetic: /adj. ɪˈlæbərɪt; v. -əˌreɪt/, (adj. i lab′ər it; v. i lab′ə rāt′)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 过于繁琐的，有很多细枝末节的
